attributes.action: Change  NHS mental health support to a 24hr  , 7 days a week service
attributes.additional_details:
We need this change because mental health is an on going illness that doesn’t suddenly go away when the mental health services have closed for the night / weekend.
Too many lives are being lost !
attributes.background: I would like the government to find a way to make sure our mental health services are always open 24hrs , 7days a week

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/585974
